name: Regcheck
author: Templines

sections.description:
Regcheck – multilingual plugin for checking cars by numbers or VIN with regcheck.org.uk APi services .

Demo

Features

Available to the following countries:

  • Australia
  • UAE
  • UK
  • USA
  • Croatia
  • Argentina
  • United Arab Emirates
  • Nigeria
  • Chile
  • Germany
  • Colombia
  • Singapore
  • Brazil
  • Mexico
  • Peru
  • Bolivia
  • Ecuador
  • Cyprus
  • Ukraine
  • Iceland
  • Latvia
  • Czech Republic
  • Denmark
  • Estonia
  • Finland
  • France
  • Hungary
  • India
  • Ireland
  • Italy
  • Netherlands
  • New Zealand
  • Norway
  • Pakistan
  • Portugal
  • Russia
  • Slovakia
  • South Africa
  • Spain
  • Sweden
  • Sri Lanka
  • Sweden

Shortcodes

Use these shortcodes to add check field on the page

[regcheck number=”on”]
[regcheck vin=”on”]
sections.installation:
Install Regcheck either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Go to Tools – Regcheck settings and set your desired options.

To create an API please register on this site – regcheck.org.uk
